video_title: Learning from Failure: The Secret to Achievement #mindsetpodcast #motivation
transcript:
so most people want to avoid success but
if you look at the most successful
people in the world they are also the
world's biggest failures like if you
look at uh Walt Disney for instance he
was fired from his first job as an
animator because they said that he had
no creativity when you look at people
like Michael Jordan who's now a
billionaire considered the best
basketball player that's ever played he
was cut from his high school basketball
team when you look at uh one of the most
successful authors that's ever lived JK
rling the the woman who wrote Harry
Potter she was rejected from something
like 12 Publishers and that book went on
to sell over 500 million copies and then
Disney created an entire theme park from
it and the creator of Honda says it
perfectly he says if you want to be
successful you have to understand that
success is 99% failure so if somebody
wants to be successful you have to
understand that failure is not the
opposite of success failure is just a
part of success
